thread.title: Ground News - LG developed a two-legged AI-powered robot that can watch your pets for you
thread.title_full: Ground News - LG developed a two-legged AI-powered robot that can watch your pets for you

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - LG developed a two-legged AI-powered robot that can watch your pets for you
text:
Summary by Ground News LG is going to start selling a compact bipedal robot that can roll around your house freely. The AI-powered robot, which will debut at CES 2024 in Las Vegas, has a wide range of capabilities. It can recognize faces and voices, process the emotions of those around it and engage in conversation. Share menu More
